titleStmt.title: The character of a true Christian: described in a sermon at the parish church of St. Botolph Bishopsgate. At the funeral of Mr. William Cade, deputy of that ward. By John Lake, D. D. late rector of that parish; and now Lord Bishop of Chichister
titleStmt.author: Lake, John, 1624-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Obadiah Blagrave at the Black Bear in St. Pauls Church-Yard, over against the little North-Door,

notesStmt.note: The title page is a cancel.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Black Bear in St. Pauls Church-Yard, over against the little North-Door
